snippet.title: DeathTower // Teaser
snippet.description:
DeathTower is an overclocked roguelite tactical JRPG. 
Survive each floor of the megastructure. Stealth, hacking, devastating weapons... Do whatever it takes to fight your way to the top and teardown the regime. 

Wishlist on steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1143910/DeathTower

Support us on Kickstarter!
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/headbangclub/deathtower-the-overclocked-roguelite-tactical-rpg

Music by Volkor X:
https://linktr.ee/volkorx
